official_title: A bill to amend section 376 of title 28, United States Code, to allow cost-of-living adjustments in judicial survivors annuities, and to increase existing annuities by 10 percent.

summary.text: Amends the Federal judicial code to: (1) allow cost-of-living adjustments in judicial survivors' annuities (adjustments are currently based upon increases in judicial salaries); and (2) increase existing annuities by ten percent.
